name: CPNavigationSession
desc: An object that represents an active route guidance session.

items.name: var trip: CPTrip
items.desc: The trip associated with the navigation session.

items.name: class CPTrip
items.desc: An object that represents a journey between an origin and a destination.

items.name: func cancelTrip()
items.desc: Tells the navigation session to cancel the trip.

items.name: func finishTrip()
items.desc: Tells the navigation session to finish the trip.

items.name: func pauseTrip(for: CPNavigationSession.PauseReason, description: String?)
items.desc: Tells the navigation session to pause the trip for the specified reason.

items.name: enum CPNavigationSession.PauseReason
items.desc: A set of reasons for pausing a trip.

items.name: var upcomingManeuvers: [CPManeuver]
items.desc: The next set of maneuvers the user should perform while following the current route.

items.name: class CPManeuver
items.desc: An object that describes a single navigation instruction.

items.name: func updateEstimates(CPTravelEstimates, for: CPManeuver)
items.desc: Updates the travel estimates for the specified maneuver.

items.name: class CPTravelEstimates
items.desc: An object that describes the time and distance remaining for a maneuver in a navigation session.

items.name: func pauseTrip(for: CPNavigationSession.PauseReason, description: String?, turnCardColor: UIColor?)
